text: Calcutta Hawkers' Men Union is a trade union of hawkers in Kolkata. CHMU was founded in 1971. CHMU is affiliated to All India Trade Union Congress. Its membership is mainly based amongst food vendors. Source: Category:All India Trade Union Congress Category:Trade unions in West Bengal Category:Retail trade unions Category:Organisations based in Kolkata Category:Street vendors Category:Trade unions established in 1971
title: Calcutta Hawkers' Men Union
